data.eml:eml: The genus Rhinoglena (Rotifera, Monogononta, Ephiphanidae) in North America, with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Segers, Hendrik, Walsh, Elizabeth J. (2017): The genus Rhinoglena (Rotifera, Monogononta, Ephiphanidae) in North America, with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 4290 (1): 113-122, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.1.6
